content: materials list **3 75mm f hook **worsted weight yarn in black red white and one 2 thread of yellow & orange **polyfil **weight of choice rice lentil beans poly-pellets pebbles keep in mind that if you use rice or lentil beans final product should not be washed/immersed in water **small tube sock baby sock works best or mesh/organza bag to contain weighted pellets **tapestry needle **stitch marker **scissors **fabric or hot glue optional skills and abbreviations mc- magic_ring chain - chain single_crochet - single_crochet st - stitch slp st - slip_stitch increase - increase 2 single crochets in each stitch decrease - decrease ** - repeat everything between stars for the entirety of the round flo - front loop only blo - back loop only
